resources.string:
A simple app for detecting nearby BLE devices, connecting to them, listing their services and characteristics and interacting with the characteristics. 
Bluetooth permissions need to be granted for use. 
Press on a scan result to enter the connection screen.There, press the "Connect" button to connect, upon which the services and their characteristics will be discovered. 

Clicking on a characteristics opens a dialog for interactions with the characteristic. Performing an action closes the signal and the corresponding event should appear in the logs. 

Made using Jetpack Compose for UI, RxJava 3 for the BLE module, and coroutines for bridging the BLE functionalities with the Flows on the app module.
